sailpoint.object

Class IdentitySelector.MatchTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      • sailpoint.object.IdentitySelector.MatchTerm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject
    Enclosing class:
    IdentitySelector

    public static class IdentitySelector.MatchTerm
extends AbstractXmlObject
    Generic representation for a single attribute or permission value within a MatchExpression.

    This is similar to EntitlementWeight in that the same class is used to represent both attribute values and Permission values. Could consider factoring out something to share but there is not much in here and the usage contexts are different.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public boolean match(Identity ident,
            Application defaultApp,
            IdentitySelector.MatchMonitor monitor)
              throws GeneralException
        Pick the "closest" application for scoping. NOTE: There is not a way to target different instances of a template application, or specific accounts if the user has more than one on the application.
